name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of extensive experience in developing robust backend systems and components, specialized in financial platforms and cloud-native architectures. Proficient in **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Python** with frameworks like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**. Skilled in building scalable services and creating high-performing **RESTful APIs** while utilizing technologies such as **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and databases like **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**. Experienced in implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and test automation practices to enhance deployment efficiency. Proven expertise in distributed systems, natural language processing (NLP), and machine learning models (LLMs), with a strong commitment to mentoring and effective communication. Successfully delivered impactful projects for esteemed organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** to engineer backend services with **FastAPI**, enhancing document automation and user onboarding workflows by 50%.
Implemented **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration with front-end applications, promoting a smooth user experience across various services.
Leveraged **Java** and **Kotlin** to develop microservices that improved system scalability and performance by 30%.
Managed asynchronous processing through **Celery** and **Redis**, optimizing financial transaction request handling by 40%.
Deployed applications using **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, ensuring high availability with **99.9% uptime** across cloud operations.
Designed and maintained data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** for regulatory data exchange and utilized **Azure Functions**, ensuring data flow was timely and accurate by 100%.
Conducted thorough security assessments, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication systems, significantly enhancing security posture.
Mentored junior developers and collaborated with cross-functional teams, addressing system integration challenges and fostering effective communication, resulting in improved team efficiency by 20%.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes, resulting in a **30%** reduction in processing time.
• Engineered event-driven microservices with **Celery** and **Redis**, facilitating asynchronous processing of over **1 million** financial data transactions daily.
• Managed deployment across **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring consistent and scalable environments with a **99.9%** uptime.
• Designed and implemented data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, employing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline data flows, increasing efficiency by **40%**.
• Conducted thorough security audits for compliance with industry standards, integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure smooth system integration and regulatory compliance, playing a critical role in successful release management and achieving **on-time delivery** for **5** major projects.

• Developed backend services leveraging **Python**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Flask** to enhance trading operations, supporting over **10,000** trades per day.
• Engaged in CI/CD processes using **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to ensure smooth deployments with a **99.9% uptime**.
• Created real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** capable of handling **5,000** data points per second for high-frequency transactions.
• Collaborated with frontend teams, delivering data through **RESTful APIs** and **WebSocket** channels to ensure a seamless user experience for **1,000+** active users.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including MiFID II and GDPR, aligning internal policies to shield over **2TB** of sensitive data.
• Implemented extensive test automation frameworks using **PyTest**, improving code quality with a **30%** reduction in bugs during production.
• Streamlined backend task execution through the implementation of job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing process management for backend operations.
